itunes:title: EPISODE 289: THE PELOSI LARP - Daughter’s Film Crew Followed Pelosi on Jan 6
title: EPISODE 289: THE PELOSI LARP - Daughter’s Film Crew Followed Pelosi on Jan 6
description:
Today on Human Events Daily, Nancy Pelosi rejected increased security at the Capitol on Jan. 6th, and instead, hired her daughter’s film crew to record a West Wing larp during the protest. Next, Taiwan prepares for the coronation of the CCP’s life-long emperor Xi Jinping. Third, while Maryland’s largest school district saw over a 500% increase in non-binary and trans students, Virginia plans to criminalize gender non-affirming parents with abuse in a new bill set forth. Finally, the beloved Wawa is closing its doors in Philadelphia due to street gangs taking control of the city. 



Here’s your Daily dose of Human Events with @JackPosobiec 


Save up to 65% on MyPillow products by going to MyPillow.com/POSO and use code POSO 


Go to www.goodranchers.com/poso to get $30 off your order and free express shipping with code POSO

Today on Human Events Daily, Nancy Pelosi rejected increased security at the Capitol on Jan. 6th, and instead, hired her daughter’s film crew to record a West Wing larp during the protest. Next, Taiwan prepares for the coronation of the CCP’s life-long emperor Xi Jinping. Third, while Maryland’s largest school district saw over a 500% increase in non-binary and trans students, Virginia plans to criminalize gender non-affirming parents with abuse in a new bill set forth. Finally, the beloved Wawa is closing its doors in Philadelphia due to street gangs taking control of the city.
